Parameters: IOException: the IOException that caused the directory iteration to fail
DirectoryIteratorException(java.io.IOExc.Description: Constructs an instance of this class.

getCause().Description: Returns the cause of this exception.

ClassDesc: Runtime exception thrown if an I/O error is encountered when iterating over the entries in a directory. The I/O error is retrieved as an @B_java#io#IOException_E@ using the @B_java#nio#file#DirectoryIteratorException#getCause_E@ method.
